B E G M N S 

B

blockingReceive() - Method in class messaging.Endpoint
Reads and returns a message.

E

Endpoint - Class in messaging
Endpoint is a class that provides message-based sending and receiving functionality.
Endpoint() - Constructor for class messaging.Endpoint
Creates a new end point with a system chosen port number.
Endpoint(int) - Constructor for class messaging.Endpoint
Creates a new end point with a given port number.

G

getPayload() - Method in class messaging.Message
Returns this message's payload.
getSender() - Method in class messaging.Message
Returns the address of this message's sender.

M

Message - Class in messaging
Message is a data object class for the payload, that is the content of a message, as well as the address of its sender.
Message(Serializable, InetSocketAddress) - Constructor for class messaging.Message
Creates a new message with the given payload and sender address.
messaging - package messaging
 

N

nonBlockingReceive() - Method in class messaging.Endpoint
Reads and returns a message, if there is one currently waiting for reading, otherwise this operation returns null.

S

send(InetSocketAddress, Serializable) - Method in class messaging.Endpoint
Sends a message with the payload payload to the receiver receiver.
